title: 1.32 The Complicated Rise of David
itunes:title: The Complicated Rise of David
description: Samuel manufactures reasons to condemn King Saul, and supplant him with David. Our two great sources, the Septuagint and the Masoretic text, have very different versions of David's complicated rise.
content:encoded: Samuel manufactures reasons to condemn King Saul, and supplant him with David. Our two great sources, the Septuagint and the Masoretic text, have very different versions of David's complicated rise.
itunes:subtitle: David bests Goliath. Saul and his children. Treachery aplenty.
itunes:author: Garry Stevens
